headline: Palo Alto's Platformization Strategy Delivers - Expensive Valuation Remains A Headwind
summary: Discover how PANW's platformization strategy & AI-driven growth align with the cloud boom, yet why cautious investing is advised amid its lofty valuations.

headline: Palo Alto Networks: Share Price And Fundamentals Continue To Diverge
summary: Palo Alto Networks' growth stabilizes in the mid-teens amid profitability pressures. Find out why PANW stock's valuation might not support continued success.
